topics.body:
Has anyone ever had a post on Tumblr that when you try to reblog it tumblr tells you that you cant?

Even though other people have reblogged it? 

Cuz I have, on several rare occasions Tumblr straight up tells me "Sorry this post cannot be reblogged" Even though others have. 

"this is the post I cant reblog":http://koichi-relatable.tumblr.com/post/124777392431/kiteazure2014

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b0132c6368726ed6000c4e#post_55b0132c6368726ed6000c4e
Well, google and Yahoo Answers tells me when that message appears, that means the person that made that post blocked you. Check to see if you're still following them because if they blocked you, tumblr would have forced your account to unfollow their blog, and won't let you refollow again.
